questions.text: What role are you looking to hire for?
What tools and technologies are required on day 1?
What traits are most important for this role? (e.g., Detail-Oriented, Collaborative)
Choose the top five skills that are critical for the role.
Choose the five least important skills that are critical for the role.

jobDetails.jobDescription: Develop and maintain web interfaces for scalable applications using React.js.
jobDetails.stakeholderEngagement: Collaborates with design and backend teams.

trait_matrix.name: Direct communication
trait_matrix.description: straightforward, direct, to the point, and forthright

trait_matrix.name: Tactful communication
trait_matrix.description: state things in a respectful and diplomatic manner

trait_matrix.name: Certain of opinion
trait_matrix.description: feel confident in one's opinions

trait_matrix.name: Open to others' opinions
trait_matrix.description: reflect on many different viewpoints

trait_matrix.name: Seeks to improve self
trait_matrix.description: attempt to develop or better oneself

trait_matrix.name: Positive self-identity
trait_matrix.description: to like oneself, as they are presently.

trait_matrix.name: Puts own needs first
trait_matrix.description: Prioritizes their goals by aligning their wants and needs first

trait_matrix.name: Puts others' needs first
trait_matrix.description: Prespond to others' needs and assist or support others' goals first before individual needs

trait_matrix.name: Fact-finding decision making
trait_matrix.description: logically examine facts and situations

trait_matrix.name: Intuition based decision making
trait_matrix.description: use hunches to help make decisions

trait_matrix.name: Self motivated
trait_matrix.description: The drive to achieve including taking initiative, wanting challenge, and being enthusiastic about goals

trait_matrix.name: Manages stress well
trait_matrix.description: Manages stress well - deal effectively with strain and difficulty when it occurs

trait_matrix.name: Persistence against work barriers
trait_matrix.description: Rbe tenacious despite encountering significant obstacles

trait_matrix.name: Experimenting against work barriers
trait_matrix.description: new things and new ways of doing things

trait_matrix.name: Organized work style
trait_matrix.description: place and maintain order in an environment or situation

trait_matrix.name: Flexible work style
trait_matrix.description: easily adapt to change

trait_matrix.name: Analyzing pitfalls
trait_matrix.description: scrutinize potential difficulties related to a plan or strategy

trait_matrix.name: Comfortable with uncertain outcomes
trait_matrix.description: feel at ease with business ventures that involve uncertainty

trait_matrix.name: Rule enforcing
trait_matrix.description: skillfully correct others when they are violating rules or performing poorly

trait_matrix.name: Friendly demeanor
trait_matrix.description: express positive feelings and affinity toward others

trait_matrix.name: Collaborative
trait_matrix.description: collaborate with others when making decisions

trait_matrix.name: Independent decision making
trait_matrix.description: the authority and the willingness to accept decision-making responsibility

trait_matrix.name: Optimistic
trait_matrix.description: believe the future will be positive

nonNegotiableQuestions: Do you have experience with React.js for at least 2 years?
Are you proficient in using Git for version control?
Can you work with TypeScript and JavaScript interchangeably?
additionalQuestions: What strategies do you use for optimizing frontend performance?
How do you ensure cross-browser compatibility?
Describe a time you collaborated with a backend team on a challenging project.
